metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3397 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A race condition occurred between the functions lmLogClose and txEnd inJFS, in the Linux Kernel, executed in different threads. This flaw allows alocal attacker with normal user privileges to crash the system or leakinternal kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
